description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Resilient File System (Refs), implement the following steps:

1. Download the relevant KB updates based on your Windows 11 version from the official Windows Update catalog.

   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)

2. Install the updates to ensure system resilience against this vulnerability.

3. Restart your system to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a security vulnerability classified under CVE-2024-38135, which could lead to unauthorized elevation of privilege.
- Ensure that your system is running one of the specified builds of Windows 11 before proceeding with the installation.
- Always back up critical data before applying system updates to prevent data loss.
